statements: SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram;
SELECT customer_id, membership_level FROM LoyaltyProgram;
SELECT total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE customer_id = 1234;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT customer_id, membership_level, total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgram ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount, membership_level FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE total_purchase_amount < 500 OR membership_level = 'Silver';
SELECT customer_id, membership_level FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE total_purchase_amount = (SELECT MAX(total_purchase_amount) FROM LoyaltyProgram);
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program WHERE total_purchase_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT lh.transaction_id, lh.customer_id, lh.transaction_date, lh.purchase_amount, lp.customer_id, lp.total_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history lh INNER JOIN loyalty_program lp ON lh.customer_id = lp.customer_id ORDER BY lh.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT lp.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count, MAX(lh.purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history lh INNER JOIN loyalty_program lp ON lh.customer_id = lp.customer_id GROUP BY lp.customer_id HAVING purchase_count > 3 ORDER BY max_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_points FROM loyalty_program_customers ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM loyalty_program_reward_catalog WHERE required_points < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_program_purchase_history ON loyalty_program_customers.customer_id = loyalty_program_purchase_history.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, total_points, reward_name FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_program_reward_catalog ON loyalty_program_customers.total_points >= loyalty_program_reward_catalog.required_points ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM loyalty_program_customers WHERE total_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM loyalty_program_purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount >= 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT reward_name, required_points FROM loyalty_program_reward_catalog WHERE required_points BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY required_points DESC;

SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_customers JOIN loyalty_program_purchase_history ON loyalty_program_customers.customer_id = loyalty_program_purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_points >= 200 AND purchase_amount < 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC, purchase_amount ASC;

SELECT customer_name, COALESCE(total_points, 0) AS points_available FROM loyalty_program_customers LEFT JOIN loyalty_program_purchase_history ON loyalty_program_customers.customer_id = loyalty_program_purchase_history.customer_id WHERE total_points IS NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT customer_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT loyalty_id, reward_name, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Bonus';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE loyalty_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT loyalty_id, reward_name, reward_type, reward_amount FROM rewards WHERE loyalty_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE loyalty_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE product_id = 10 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT description, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_type = 'Discount';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT program_name, description FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT c.name, r.reward_type, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id JOIN rewards r ON t.reward_id = r.reward_id;
